response.overview: More incredible that Star Wars because it's all true! This is Nightstalkers...the amazing story of the Stealth aircraft that for nearly a decade held a secret trump card for America. Nightstalkers...the ghostly shadow that slipped through Iraqi radar defenses and hit enemy targets with pinpoint accuracy! These are the places build in total secrecy, flown only at night...for years the government refused to admit they even existed! Now, fly with the F117A and the even more unusual Stealth Bomber, the B-2! Learn how the company that designed the "Flying Wing" did it again in Stealth form with the aid of a super computer. Learn about the Stealth system that lets our pilots fight down low in the dark! Fly high with the SR-71 "Blackbird" and take a look at the B1 Lancer. It's all here on Nightstalkers...the true story of America's greatest secret weapon since the Atomic Bomb! See it for the first time!
response.tagline: This is Nightstalkers...the amazing story of the Stealth aircraft that for nearly a decade held a secret trump card for America.
response.title: Nightstalkers
